timeline.message:
Data recovery commands in CLI Tool (#5371)

Added durableLog-recovery <root> and list-segments <root> commands and their implementations.

Signed-off-by: ManishKumarKeshri <manish.keshri562@gmail.com>
Signed-off-by: ManishKumarKeshri <manish.keshri562@gmail.com>

Merge remote-tracking branch 'upstream/master' into HEAD

Signed-off-by: ManishKumarKeshri <manish.keshri562@gmail.com>

Issue 4670: SegmentContainer in recovery mode (#4716)

- A way to start segment container in recovery mode(debug segment container) to create given segment(s).
- Wrapper class to TableStore & StreamSegmentStore to track the segments being created or deleted. This helps in integration tests to wait for segments to be flushed to storage(keep polling for segment's length in the storage to ensure that it is fully flushed).
- Under ContainerRecoveryTestUtils: Lists all segments from storage using the already supported listSegments() API. Create all segments in the list using the debug segment container instance

Signed-off-by: ManishKumarKeshri <manish.keshri562@gmail.com>

Issue 5095: DR Integration tests included for multiple containers and Transactional writers (#5099)

This tests a scenario when durable data log fails after all the segments have been flushed to the long term storage. In such a situation, debug segment container(s) are started to restore the data in a new durable data log.
Includes tests to start multiple debug segment containers and use transactions for writing events.

Signed-off-by: ManishKumarKeshri <manish.keshri562@gmail.com>

Issue 5095: DR Integration tests included for readers stalling & watermarking (#5113)

Added a test for the scenario when durable data log fails after all the segments have been flushed to the long term storage. In such a situation, debug segment container(s) are started to restore the data in a new durable data log.
In this PR, tests have been included in the integration test
-    to replicate the scenario when readers stop while reading and then failure-recovery takes place. It is validated if the readers are able to resume reading from the same position or not.
-    to add watermarks to the events, and then read all the events after failover-recovery and verify that all events are have correct bounds.


Signed-off-by: ManishKumarKeshri <manish.keshri562@gmail.com>

Issue 5192: Copying a segment (#5193)

API to copy the contents of a segment to another segment.

Signed-off-by: ManishKumarKeshri <manish.keshri562@gmail.com>

Issue 5169: Data Recovery - Copy the core attributes from old segment metadata to new segment metadata (#5253)

Instead of directly deleting the container metadata and its attribute segments, we now keep a back up copy of them and then delete them. This back up copy is used to update the attributes of the recovered segments.

Signed-off-by: ManishKumarKeshri <manish.keshri562@gmail.com>

Issue 5285: Timeouts in ContainerRecoveryUtils. (#5293)

Using timeout as a parameter to the methods in ContainerRecoveryUtils.java.

Signed-off-by: ManishKumarKeshri <manish.keshri562@gmail.com>

Issue 5325: DR integration test does not work with FileSystem storage (#5326)

Updating config parameters of debug segment containers.

Signed-off-by: ManishKumarKeshri <manish.keshri562@gmail.com>

Reducing time in DR integration tests (#5292)

Reducing time.

Signed-off-by: ManishKumarKeshri <manish.keshri562@gmail.com>

Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/pravega/pravega into merger-for-master

Signed-off-by: ManishKumarKeshri <manish.keshri562@gmail.com>

Updating createStreamSegment API call.

Signed-off-by: ManishKumarKeshri <manish.keshri562@gmail.com>

Minor checkstyle fail.

Signed-off-by: ManishKumarKeshri <manish.keshri562@gmail.com>

Minor change.

Signed-off-by: ManishKumarKeshri <manish.keshri562@gmail.com>

Issue 4938: Merge branch 'master' into feature-4938-dr-tools-base-case

Signed-off-by: ManishKumarKeshri <manish.keshri562@gmail.com>

Data recovery commands in CLI Tool (#5371)

Added durableLog-recovery <root> and list-segments <root> commands and their implementations.

Signed-off-by: ManishKumarKeshri <manish.keshri562@gmail.com>

Data recovery commands in CLI Tool (#5371)

Added durableLog-recovery <root> and list-segments <root> commands and their implementations.

Signed-off-by: ManishKumarKeshri <manish.keshri562@gmail.com>
Merge branch 'master' into feature-4938-dr-tools-base-case

Minor changes.

Signed-off-by: ManishKumarKeshri <manish.keshri562@gmail.com>
Merge branch 'feature-4938-dr-tools-base-case' of https://github.com/ManishKumarKeshri/pravega into HEAD

Minor Checkstyle error.

Signed-off-by: ManishKumarKeshri <manish.keshri562@gmail.com>

Reverting back access specifier at one position.

Signed-off-by: ManishKumarKeshri <manish.keshri562@gmail.com>
Merge branch 'master' into feature-4938-dr-tools-base-case

timeline.bodyText: @ManishKumarKeshri please, use the existing name structure, as I think that the property name used in this PR is from the old naming structure. @ravisharda is that correct?
timeline.author: RaulGracia
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -19,11 +19,43 @@ cli.controller.grpc.uri=tcp://localhost:9090
 cli.store.metadata.backend=segmentstore
 
 # General configuration for the Pravega cluster at hand.
-pravegaservice.cluster.name=pravega/pravega
+pravegaservice.clusterName=pravega/pravega

replies.bodyText:
It should be clusterName as mentioned here: 
  
    
      pravega/segmentstore/server/src/main/java/io/pravega/segmentstore/server/store/ServiceConfig.java
    
    
         Line 54
      in
      b5a8093
    
    
    
    

        
          
           public static final Property<String> CLUSTER_NAME = Property.named("clusterName", "pravega-cluster");
replies.author: ManishKumarKeshri

timeline.message: Merge branch 'master' into feature-4938-dr-tools-base-case
